Search.Name: 15-2 sequence diagram objects with class guid and stereotypes

RootTable.Filter: SELECT t_object.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, 't_object' as CLASSTABLE, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_diagram.Name AS Diagram_Name, t_diagram.Diagram_ID, t_object.Object_ID, t_object.Name, t_object.Package_ID AS Object_Package, t_object.Classifier, IIF( t_object.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) AS Class_Guid, IIF( t_object.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object.Name, o2.Name ) AS Class_Name, t_stereotypes.ea_guid AS stereotypes_ea_guid FROM ((((( t_diagram INNER JOIN t_diagramobjects ON t_diagram.Diagram_ID = t_diagramobjects.Diagram_ID) INNER JOIN t_object ON t_diagramobjects.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_stereotypes ON t_object.stereotype = t_stereotypes.stereotype) LEFT JOIN t_object o2 ON t_object.Classifier = o2.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_package ON t_diagram.Package_ID = t_package.Package_ID) WHERE (t_object.Package_ID <> t_package.Package_ID) AND t_diagram.Diagram_Type='sequence'

SELECT t_object.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, 't_object' as CLASSTABLE, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE,t_connector.* FROM t_connector INNER JOIN t_object ON t_connector.Start_Object_ID=t_object.Object_ID WHERE t_connector.Name IS NOT NULL AND RIGHT(t_connector.Name, 1)<>')'

SELECT t_object_end.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_object' AS CLASSTABLE, t_object_end.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID, t_Diagram.Name, t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Connector_Type, IIF( INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(') = 0, t_connector.Name, LEFT(t_connector.Name, INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(')- 1) )AS Massege, t_operation.Name AS Oparation, t_connector.Start_Object_ID, t_object.Package_ID AS Start_Object_Packeg, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object_end.Package_ID AS End_Object_Packeg, t_object_end.Classifier AS End_Object_Classifier, IIF( t_object_end.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object_end.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) AS Guid_Classifier FROM((((((( t_object INNER JOIN t_DiagramObjects ON t_object.Object_ID = t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_connector ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_connector.DiagramID) INNER JOIN t_object AS t_object_end ON t_connector.End_Object_ID = t_object_end.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_stereotypes ON t_object_end.stereotype = t_stereotypes.stereotype) LEFT JOIN t_object o2 ON t_object_end.Classifier = o2.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_Diagram ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_Diagram.Diagram_ID) LEFT JOIN t_operation ON o2.Object_ID = t_operation.Object_ID) WHERE t_connector.Name IS NOT NULL AND (t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID = t_connector.Start_Object_ID OR t_connector.Start_Object_ID = t_connector.End_Object_ID) GROUP BY t_object_end.ea_guid, t_object_end.Object_Type, t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID, t_Diagram.Name, t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Connector_Type, t_connector.Name, t_operation.Name, t_connector.Start_Object_ID, t_object.Package_ID, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object.Classifier, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object_end.Package_ID, t_object_end.Classifier, IIF( t_object_end.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object_end.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) HAVING IIF( INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(') = 0, t_connector.Name, LEFT(t_connector.Name, INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(')- 1) ) =t_operation.Name

SELECT t_object_end.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_object' AS CLASSTABLE, t_object_end.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID, t_Diagram.Name, t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Connector_Type, IIF( INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(') = 0, t_connector.Name, LEFT(t_connector.Name, INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(')- 1) )AS Massege, t_operation.Name AS Oparation, t_connector.Start_Object_ID, t_object.Package_ID AS Start_Object_Packeg, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object_end.Package_ID AS End_Object_Packeg, t_object_end.Classifier AS End_Object_Classifier, IIF( t_object_end.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object_end.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) AS Guid_Classifier FROM((((((( t_object INNER JOIN t_DiagramObjects ON t_object.Object_ID = t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_connector ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_connector.DiagramID) INNER JOIN t_object AS t_object_end ON t_connector.End_Object_ID = t_object_end.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_stereotypes ON t_object_end.stereotype = t_stereotypes.stereotype) LEFT JOIN t_object o2 ON t_object_end.Classifier = o2.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_Diagram ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_Diagram.Diagram_ID) LEFT JOIN t_operation ON o2.Object_ID = t_operation.Object_ID) WHERE t_connector.Name IS NOT NULL AND (t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID = t_connector.Start_Object_ID OR t_connector.Start_Object_ID = t_connector.End_Object_ID) GROUP BY t_object_end.ea_guid, t_object_end.Object_Type, t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID, t_Diagram.Name, t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Connector_Type, t_connector.Name, t_operation.Name, t_connector.Start_Object_ID, t_object.Package_ID, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object.Classifier, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object_end.Package_ID, t_object_end.Classifier, IIF( t_object_end.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object_end.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) HAVING IIF( INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(') = 0, t_connector.Name, LEFT(t_connector.Name, INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(')- 1) ) = t_operation.Name

Search.Name: 15-2 diagram objects whith class guid and stereotype guid

RootTable.Filter: SELECT t_object.ea_guid as CLASSGUID, 't_object' as CLASSTABLE, t_object.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_diagram.Name AS Diagram_Name, t_diagram.Diagram_ID, t_object.Object_ID, t_object.Name, t_object.Package_ID AS Object_Package, t_object.Classifier, IIF( t_object.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) AS Class_Guid, IIF( t_object.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object.Name, o2.Name ) AS Class_Name, t_stereotypes.ea_guid AS stereotypes_ea_guid FROM ((((( t_diagram INNER JOIN t_diagramobjects ON t_diagram.Diagram_ID = t_diagramobjects.Diagram_ID) INNER JOIN t_object ON t_diagramobjects.Object_ID = t_object.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_stereotypes ON t_object.stereotype = t_stereotypes.stereotype) LEFT JOIN t_object o2 ON t_object.Classifier = o2.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_package ON t_diagram.Package_ID = t_package.Package_ID) WHERE (t_object.Package_ID <> t_package.Package_ID)

SELECT t_object_end.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 't_object' AS CLASSTABLE, t_object_end.Object_Type AS CLASSTYPE, t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID, t_Diagram.Name, t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Connector_Type, t_connector.Name AS massege, t_connector.Start_Object_ID, t_object.Package_ID AS Start_Object_Packeg, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object_end.Package_ID AS End_Object_Packeg, t_object_end.Classifier AS End_Object_Classifier, IIF( t_object_end.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object_end.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid ) AS Guid_Classifier FROM(((((( t_object INNER JOIN t_DiagramObjects ON t_object.Object_ID = t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_connector ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_connector.DiagramID) INNER JOIN t_object AS t_object_end ON t_connector.End_Object_ID = t_object_end.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_stereotypes ON t_object_end.stereotype = t_stereotypes.stereotype) LEFT JOIN t_object o2 ON t_object_end.Classifier = o2.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_Diagram ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_Diagram.Diagram_ID) WHERE t_connector.Name IS NOT NULL AND (t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID = t_connector.Start_Object_ID OR t_connector.Start_Object_ID = t_connector.End_Object_ID) GROUP BY t_object_end.ea_guid, t_object_end.Object_Type, t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID, t_Diagram.Name, t_connector.Connector_ID, t_connector.Connector_Type, t_connector.Name, t_connector.Start_Object_ID, t_object.Package_ID, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object.Classifier, t_connector.End_Object_ID, t_object_end.Package_ID, t_object_end.Classifier, IIF( t_object_end.Object_Type IN ('Class', 'Interface'), t_object_end.ea_guid, o2.ea_guid )

Search.Name: 15-2 connector massege how don't from method

RootTable.Filter: SELECT t_connector.Connector_ID,t_connector.Name AS Massege FROM t_connector WHERE t_connector.Name IS NOT NULL AND t_connector.Connector_ID NOT IN ( SELECT t_connector.Connector_ID FROM((((((( t_object INNER JOIN t_DiagramObjects ON t_object.Object_ID = t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID) INNER JOIN t_connector ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_connector.DiagramID) INNER JOIN t_object AS t_object_end ON t_connector.End_Object_ID = t_object_end.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_stereotypes ON t_object_end.stereotype = t_stereotypes.stereotype) LEFT JOIN t_object o2 ON t_object_end.Classifier = o2.Object_ID) LEFT JOIN t_Diagram ON t_DiagramObjects.Diagram_ID = t_Diagram.Diagram_ID) LEFT JOIN t_operation ON o2.Object_ID = t_operation.Object_ID) WHERE (t_connector.Start_Object_ID IS NOT NULL OR t_connector.End_Object_ID IS NOT NULL) AND t_connector.Name IS NOT NULL AND (t_DiagramObjects.Object_ID = t_connector.Start_Object_ID OR t_connector.Start_Object_ID = t_connector.End_Object_ID) GROUP BY t_connector.Connector_ID, IIF( INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(') = 0, t_connector.Name, LEFT(t_connector.Name, INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(')- 1) ) = t_operation.Name HAVING IIF( INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(') = 0, t_connector.Name, LEFT(t_connector.Name, INSTR(1, t_connector.Name, '(')- 1) ) = t_operation.Name)
